Package com.sun.jersey.client.apache4.config

Provides support for configuration of a ApacheHttpClient4.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ApacheHttpClient4Config Configuration options specific to the Client API that utilizes ApacheHttpClient4 or ApacheHttpClient4Handler.
 

Class Summary
DefaultApacheHttpClient4Config A default client configuration for clients that utilizes the Apache HTTP client to send and receive HTTP request and responses.
 

Package com.sun.jersey.client.apache4.config Description

Provides support for configuration of a ApacheHttpClient4.
